=== What is NUET ===
The New User Experience Team was implemented to assist<<BR>>
the new user in their personal discovery of Ubuntu software.<<BR>> 
<<BR>>
==== Discovery ====
Finding the correct channels and who and what to ask is<<BR>>
a major hurdle many have. Learning the basics in an efficient<<BR>>
manner helps people to enjoy the new software.<<BR>>
<<BR>>
===== What we do? =====
We assist new members to find common solutions. Providing<<BR>> 
them with links to their local resources, LoCo Teams, and<<BR>>
tutorials.<<BR>>
<<BR>>
We create video tutorials on many aspects of the software. <<BR>>
<<BR>>
====== How you can Help ======
Anyone can sign up for the <nowiki>[[https://edge.launchpad.net/~new-user-experience-team|team]]</nowiki> or ask a question<<BR>>on the <nowiki>[[mailto:new-user-experience-team@lists.launchpad.net|mailing list]]</nowiki>. You may also answer questions you<<BR>>see from the <nowiki>[[https://lists.launchpad.net/new-user-experience-team/threads.html|archives]]</nowiki> <<BR>>
